gt_summary: Buy a new stem and handle for your tub. Screw the stem onto the faucet pipe. Slide your new handle over the stem and screw it in place.
pred_summary: To replace your faucet, bring the old stem and handle with you to the store, and buy new stems and handles that fit your system. Once you have the new stem, screw it into the old pipes and secure it with a socket wrench. Install the new handle by pushing it onto the stem and tightening the screw with a screwdriver.

gt_summary: Start holding the barre in first or fifth position. To prep for practice, go to passé en relevé. Plié and dèveloppé front. Open your leg to the side, or à la seconde. Bring everything in at once. Once you have those three moves down, do a pirouette.
pred_summary: The text describes a barre exercise for beginners that focuses on the basic steps of ballet, including passé, relevé, plié, and developé. The exercise starts with the right foot in passé position and the left hand on the bar, with the core tight and hips down. The exercise then progresses to the next positions, such as relevé, plié, and developé, while keeping the core and hips down.

gt_summary: Create a solution with warm water and mild dish soap. Submerge your crystal in the solution. Rinse thoroughly. Apply a bit of toothpaste to remove mineral deposits on the crystal. Cover crystal in a mixture of vinegar and salt to remove deposits. Dry your crystal.
pred_summary: Crystal cleaning can be done using a few simple steps. First, fill a sink or bucket with warm water and a small amount of mild dish soap. Next, soak the crystal in the solution for a few minutes before rinsing it with warm water. Finally, use a toothpaste or paste made from vinegar and salt to remove any stubborn mineral deposits or residue.

gt_summary: Think about your own feelings about the abortion. Talk to her about how you feel when the time is right. Reach out to people you trust. Remember that the process will take time for both of you.
pred_summary: The text advises a man whose girlfriend had an abortion to be patient and honest with his feelings. He should confront his emotions mentally and talk to a trusted friend or family member, or even a therapist or counselor, if he's not ready to talk to his girlfriend yet. It's important to set boundaries and compromise with his girlfriend, and to prioritize his mental health.

gt_summary: Measure out four tablespoons calcium (carbonate) powder. Add two tablespoons baking soda. Include ½ teaspoon of stevia. Sprinkle in one teaspoon sea salt. Mix all of the ingredients together.
pred_summary: Calcium carbonate tablets or calcium powder can be added to a tooth powder recipe to help rebuild the calcium in teeth. Baking soda reduces acid content in the mouth, while stevia makes the tooth powder sweeter. Sea salt adds minerals to the tooth powder and helps to re-mineralize teeth.
